result.name: selectivity-of-gillnets-used-in-the-cornish-red-mullet-fishery-2010-11-fisheries-science-partne
result.notes:
To look at the capture of red mullet, and associated species, with different 
mesh sizes of gill nets. A range of nets will be used, within the range 
50-80mm, made up into identical fleets to help determine the desirable net 
size to reduce the number of discards.
